title: 1 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Even Risk-Averse Investors Can Buy Without Hesitation

title: Restaurant battles fake deals offered by Google AI: ‘It’s coming back on us’

title: Opinion | A.I. Might Change the World Without Remaking It
description: Artificial intelligence may change the world, but it probably won’t remake it.
